00036 class ChunkBase : public NDimensional<4>, public util::PropertyMap
00037 {
00038 protected:
00039     static const char *neededProperties;
00040     ChunkBase() {}; //do not use this
00041 public:
00042     //  static const dimensions dimension[n_dims]={rowDim,columnDim,sliceDim,timeDim};
00043     typedef isis::util::_internal::ValueReference <ChunkBase > Reference;
00044 
00045     ChunkBase( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps );
00046     virtual ~ChunkBase(); //needed to make it polymorphic
00047 };

00051 template <typename TYPE> class VoxelOp: std::unary_function<bool, TYPE>
00052 {
00053 public:
00054     virtual bool operator()( TYPE &vox, const util::vector4<size_t> &pos ) = 0;
00055     virtual ~VoxelOp() {}
00056 };

00063 class Chunk : public _internal::ChunkBase, protected ValuePtrReference
00064 {
00065     friend class Image;
00066     friend class std::vector<Chunk>;
00067 protected:
00077     template<typename TYPE, typename D> Chunk( TYPE *src, D d, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 ):
00078         _internal::ChunkBase( nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps ), ValuePtrReference( ValuePtr<TYPE>( src, getVolume(), d ) ) {}
00079 
00080     Chunk() {}; //do not use this
00081 public:
00082 
00083     typedef _internal::ValuePtrBase::value_iterator iterator;
00084     typedef _internal::ValuePtrBase::const_value_iterator const_iterator;
00085     typedef iterator::reference reference;
00086     typedef const_iterator::reference const_reference;
00087 
00088     Chunk( const ValuePtrReference &src, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 );
00089 
00095     template<typename TYPE> TYPE &voxel( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 0, size_t nrOfSlices = 0, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 0 ) {
00096         const size_t idx[] = {nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps};
00097         LOG_IF( ! isInRange( idx ), Debug, isis::error )
00098                 << "Index " << util::vector4<size_t>( idx ) << " is out of range " << getSizeAsString();
00099         ValuePtr<TYPE> &ret = asValuePtr<TYPE>();
00100         return ret[getLinearIndex( idx )];
00101     }
00102 
00103     const util::ValueReference getVoxelValue( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 0, size_t nrOfSlices = 0, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 0 )const;
00104     void setVoxelValue( const util::ValueReference &val, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 0, size_t nrOfSlices = 0, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 0 );
00105 
00110     template<typename TYPE> const TYPE &voxel( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 0, size_t nrOfSlices = 0, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 0 )const {
00111         const size_t idx[] = {nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps};
00112 
00113         if ( !isInRange( idx ) ) {
00114             LOG( Debug, isis::error )
00115                     << "Index " << util::vector4<size_t>( idx ) << nrOfTimesteps
00116                     << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ")";
00117         }
00118 
00119         const ValuePtr<TYPE> &ret = const_cast<Chunk&>(*this).asValuePtr<TYPE>();
00120 
00121         return ret[getLinearIndex( idx )];
00122     }
00123 
00124     void copySlice( size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, Chunk &dst, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const;
00125 
00134     template <typename TYPE> size_t foreachVoxel( VoxelOp<TYPE> &op, util::vector4<size_t> offset ) {
00135         const util::vector4<size_t> imagesize = getSizeAsVector();
00136         util::vector4<size_t> pos;
00137         TYPE *vox = &asValuePtr<TYPE>()[0];
00138         size_t ret = 0;
00139 
00140         for( pos[timeDim] = 0; pos[timeDim] < imagesize[timeDim]; pos[timeDim]++ )
00141             for( pos[sliceDim] = 0; pos[sliceDim] < imagesize[sliceDim]; pos[sliceDim]++ )
00142                 for( pos[columnDim] = 0; pos[columnDim] < imagesize[columnDim]; pos[columnDim]++ )
00143                     for( pos[rowDim] = 0; pos[rowDim] < imagesize[rowDim]; pos[rowDim]++ ) {
00144                         if( op( *( vox++ ), pos + offset ) == false )
00145                             ++ret;
00146                     }
00147 
00148         return ret;
00149     }
00150 
00156     template<typename TYPE> size_t foreachVoxel( VoxelOp<TYPE> &op ) {
00157         return foreachVoxel<TYPE>( op, util::vector4<size_t>() );
00158     }
00159 
00160     iterator begin();
00161     iterator end();
00162     const_iterator begin()const;
00163     const_iterator end()const;

00166     const _internal::ValuePtrBase &getValuePtrBase()const {return operator*();}
00167 
00168     template<typename TYPE> ValuePtr<TYPE> &asValuePtr() {return asValuePtrBase().castToValuePtr<TYPE>();}
00169     template<typename TYPE> const ValuePtr<TYPE> getValuePtr()const {return getValuePtrBase().castToValuePtr<TYPE>();}

00181     bool convertToType( short unsigned int ID, scaling_pair scaling = scaling_pair() );

00191     template<typename T> bool copyToMem( T *dst, size_t len, scaling_pair scaling = scaling_pair() )const {
00192         return getValuePtrBase().copyToMem<T>( dst, len,  scaling ); // use copyToMem of ValuePtrBase
00193     }
00194 
00196     scaling_pair getScalingTo( unsigned short typeID, autoscaleOption scaleopt = autoscale )const;

00245     bool transformCoords( boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<float> transform_matrix, bool transformCenterIsImageCenter = false ) {
00246         if( hasProperty( "rowVec" ) && hasProperty( "columnVec" ) && hasProperty( "sliceVec" )
00247             && hasProperty( "voxelSize" ) && hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00248             if( !isis::data::_internal::transformCoords( *this, getSizeAsVector(), transform_matrix, transformCenterIsImageCenter ) ) {
00249                 LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Error during transforming the coords of the chunk.";
00250                 return false;
00251             }
00252 
00253             return true;
00254         }
00255 
00256         return true;
00257     }
00261     void swapAlong( const dimensions dim ) const;

00274 template<typename TYPE> class MemChunk : public Chunk
00275 {
00276 public:
00278     MemChunk( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 ):
00279         Chunk( ValuePtrReference( ValuePtr<TYPE>( nrOfColumns *nrOfRows *nrOfSlices *nrOfTimesteps ) ), nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps ) {}
00291     template<typename T> MemChunk( const T *const org, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 ):
00292         Chunk( ValuePtrReference( ValuePtr<TYPE>( nrOfColumns *nrOfRows *nrOfSlices *nrOfTimesteps ) ), nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps ) {
00293         util::checkType<T>();
00294         asValuePtrBase().copyFromMem( org, getVolume() );
00295     }
00297     MemChunk( const Chunk &ref ): Chunk( ref ) {
00298         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00299         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00300     }
00307     MemChunk( const Chunk &ref, const scaling_pair &scaling ): Chunk( ref ) {
00308         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00309         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID, scaling ) );
00310     }
00311     MemChunk( const MemChunk<TYPE> &ref ): Chunk( ref ) { //this is needed, to prevent generation of default-copy constructor
00312         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00313         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00314     }
00316     MemChunk &operator=( const Chunk &ref ) {
00317         LOG_IF( useCount() > 1, Debug, warning )
00318                 << "Not overwriting current chunk memory (which is still used by " << useCount() - 1 << " other chunk(s)).";
00319         Chunk::operator=( ref ); //copy the chunk of ref
00320         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00321         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00322         return *this;
00323     }
00325     MemChunk &operator=( const MemChunk<TYPE> &ref ) { //this is needed, to prevent generation of default-copy operator
00326         return operator=( static_cast<const Chunk &>( ref ) );
00327     }
00328 };

00331 template<typename TYPE> class MemChunkNonDel : public Chunk
00332 {
00333 public:
00334     //
00336     MemChunkNonDel( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 ):
00337         Chunk(
00338             ( TYPE * )calloc( nrOfTimesteps *nrOfSlices *nrOfRows *nrOfColumns, sizeof( TYPE ) ),
00339             typename ValuePtr<TYPE>::NonDeleter(),
00340             nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps
00341         ) {}
00354     template<typename T> MemChunkNonDel( const T *const org, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows = 1, size_t nrOfSlices = 1, size_t nrOfTimesteps = 1 ):
00355         Chunk(
00356             ( TYPE * )malloc( sizeof( TYPE )*nrOfTimesteps *nrOfSlices *nrOfRows *nrOfColumns ),
00357             typename ValuePtr<TYPE>::NonDeleter(),
00358             nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps
00359         ) {
00360         util::checkType<T>();
00361         asValuePtrBase().copyFromMem( org, getVolume() );
00362     }
00364     MemChunkNonDel( const Chunk &ref ): Chunk( ref ) {
00365         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00366         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00367     }
00375     MemChunkNonDel( const Chunk &ref, const util::_internal::ValueBase &min, const  util::_internal::ValueBase &max ): Chunk( ref ) {
00376         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00377         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID, min, max ) );
00378     }
00379     MemChunkNonDel( const MemChunk<TYPE> &ref ): Chunk( ref ) { //this is needed, to prevent generation of default-copy constructor
00380         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00381         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00382     }
00384     MemChunkNonDel &operator=( const Chunk &ref ) {
00385         LOG_IF( useCount() > 1, Debug, warning )
00386                 << "Not overwriting current chunk memory (which is still used by " << useCount() - 1 << " other chunk(s)).";
00387         Chunk::operator=( ref ); //copy the chunk of ref
00388         //get rid of my ValuePtr and make a new copying/converting the data of ref (use the reset-function of the scoped_ptr Chunk is made of)
00389         ValuePtrReference::operator=( ref.getValuePtrBase().copyByID( ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticID ) );
00390         return *this;
00391     }
00393     MemChunkNonDel &operator=( const MemChunkNonDel<TYPE> &ref ) { //this is needed, to prevent generation of default-copy operator
00394         return operator=( static_cast<const Chunk &>( ref ) );
00395     }
00396 };
